com.immortallabs.cardboard
Class CardBoardPreferences

java.lang.Object
  com.immortallabs.cardboard.CardBoardPreferences

public class CardBoardPreferences
extends java.lang.Object

The CardBoardPreferences class models all options for the game. If a player changes any options this class persists the change until next game is started

Operations:
  • The CardBoardPreferences class can get a current game preference
  • The CardBoardPreferences class can set a current game preference

Version:
1.3, 12/05/08
Author:
Ryan Lange, Formerly Thomas Dvornik, RustyNail CSC308 F08
Version History:
- 02/20/09 1.2 Changed to a singleton class. - 12/02/08 1.1 Added Version History & Pseudocode to CardBoardPreference(), getPreferences(), setPreference()
- 12/03/08 1.2 Moved into correct package.
